billing_payment_method_add_bank_account_: Surname and first name of owner or organisation owner
Within 24 to 48 hours, you will receive an email via the email address linked to your OVHcloud account. This email will contain a link for the electronic signature of your direct debit mandate.
Warning: the bank account owner must also be the OVHcloud account owner.
Once your direct debit mandate has been received by our services, if it gets approved, you can then use this new payment method.

The data collected via this form is processed by OVHcloud as a data controller in order to set up your SEPA direct debit. Find out more about how OVHcloud processes your data, and how you exercise your rights.

To set up a SEPA direct debit, you will need to sign a mandate electronically using a solution provided by Yousign, a service provider authorised to deliver the trusted services defined by the “eIDAS” Regulation No. 910/2014 of 23 July 2014. In this context, the data is sent to Yousign. Find out more about how Yousign manages your data.
